thread.title: BREAKING NEWS: Ghana names experienced starting line-up against Canada Acquah, Waris axed
thread.title_full: BREAKING NEWS: Ghana names experienced starting line-up against Canada Acquah, Waris axed

title: BREAKING NEWS: Ghana names experienced starting line-up against Canada Acquah, Waris axed
text:
Sports News | 14 October 2015 00:55 CET BREAKING NEWS: Ghana names experienced starting line-up against Canada â€“ Acquah, Waris axed - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana Black Stars 
Ghana coach Avram Grant has opted to go with experience in his starting line -up to face Canada on Tuesday night but he left out regular midfielder Afriyie Acquah as well as all the four players chasing their debuts in the friendly. 
The Israeli manager stuck with the regular starters for the Black Stars with rare start for USA-based David Accam who gets chance to impress. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
